messages.subject: Re: Conference dates again
messages.msgSnippet: Okay, I m cracking up. I have received several e-mails, in addition to the stuff here, from people apologizing for maybe being rude to me about the conference
messages.messageBody:
Okay, I'm cracking up. I have received several e-mails, in addition to the
stuff here, from people apologizing for maybe being rude to me about the
conference dates!!!! LOL Interestingly enough, none of the people who are
apologizing said anything obnoxious or rude at all!

I am fine. I am assuming the less kind things were from people stressed about
possibly not being able to make a conference they wanted to attend. Please
don't worry!

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
